entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #61727
  • Breaking changes in identity hashing algorythms check #61726
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61723
  • Generated OpenAPI schema is invalid for nested recursive polymorphic type, even without arrays #61722
  • Invalid type rendering for <script type="application/ld+json"> renders as type="application/ld+json" #61718
  • OpenApi Json schema is incorrect in Dotnet version 9.0.4 #61717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #61716

Closed

  • Add support for setting security attributes on Http.Sys RequestQueue #61084
    10.0-preview5
  • Blazor application fails while running in production on a Linux container #61549
  • Minimal API validation does not use ProblemDetails #61533
  • Dependency Injection Conflict with Null Parameter in SignalR Hub Methods #61491
    10.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: json #61712
  • Minimal API Validation fails for DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #61558
  • Min API validation fails for Record types #61379
  • Blazor.web.js doesn't work with MapStaticAssets #61713
  • button not responsive in razor page #61521

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of parsable types in validations generator #61728
    area-minimal, feature-validation
  • Add statically-typed support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61721
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25216.37 #61720
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Try register LazyAssemblyLoader to DI in AddInteractiveWebAssemblyCom… #61719
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Add support for setting security attributes on Http.Sys RequestQueue #61325
    feature-httpsys, area-networking, 10.0-preview5
  • [OpenApi] Fix thread static use and write directly to PipeWriter #61700
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61704
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5
  • Fix Dependency Injection Conflict with Null Parameter in SignalR Hub Methods #61687
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5
  • Add auto-merges for dependabot PRs targeting main #61725
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • Add auto-merges for SDK updates #61724
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure
  • Follow-up: Improve stopping renderer, fix identity template #61633
    area-blazor, feature-prerendering, feature-blazor-navigation, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add reflection-based support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61673
    area-blazor
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo suggesting ValueTuple syntax for Unions #9338
  • Extensions: record LDM decision for ORPA on properties #9335

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarification Request: AutoInclude Behavior for Nested Navigation Properties in EF Core #36010
  • JSON mapped owned entities hinder creating index on the underlying column #36008
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #36007

Closed

  • Updata cannot modify Discriminatorproperties. #35988
  • CLI "dotnet ef migrations" throws "error MSB4057: The target "GetEFProjectMetadata" does not exist in the project." requiring work around #36002
  • Add `--json` Argument to `dotnet ef migrations has-pending-model-changes` Command #36003
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36005

Updated

  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL in more cases #35986
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect logic of the Picker element when an item in a binded collection is deleted #29235
  • Android WebView Navigated is fired without setting source #29233
  • Android Orphan Overlay Leading to App Freeze #29227
  • Lightweight instances of controls remain in memory after navigation when “Collapse small object types” is disabled #29224
  • I9_Incremental_loading_on_scroll - Jumping back to the top of the list as you scroll down. #29223

Closed

  • [Android][iOS] CollectionView.CanReorderItems does not work #13100
  • [Android] Setting IsBusy to True on MainPage of Shell app will cause crash #13138
  • CollectionView: IsVisible - expand selected rows fails on iOS #15112
  • IOS 14+: TabBar disappears after Long-press back button #16576
  • Window.ModalPopping closes app when e.Cancel = true #23462
  • App crash when is started from another app. #19374
    Backlog
  • [Android] .NET 9 Maui - Crash with CreateWindow method - SingleInstance #28906
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Rotating an image with an animation results in a wobble #15116
    Backlog
  • Click And TapGestureRecognizer is not working on Windows #29073
  • Memory Leak is detected when using Border #29023

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix WebView Navigated is fired when source is null #29234
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Scrolling Feature #29230
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Re-Enabled UI Test - Issue10222Test #29226
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Removed Frame styles from the default project template #29222
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [inflight/current] [Inflight] Fix Build Issue in [2025/04/28] Candidate #29231
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • add global xmlns in template #29203
  • Fixed - On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #29024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [net 10.0 Testing] Enabled CachedFilenameIsCorrectAndValid test #29143
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Selection Feature #29165
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • fixed typo in Connectivity.shared.cs #29213
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29158 - [2025/04/28] Candidate #29168
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing][Inflight] Fix failing test case in [2025/04/28] Candidate #29161
    area-testing, community ✨, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • ScrollView CrossPlatformMeasure - refactor #27085
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Top bar item colors - fix #26964
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] TimePicker focus & unfocus events #26949
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] ListView ContextActions in modal page #26854
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [iOS] List view headers - fix #26826
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection to not create VisualStudioWorkspace #78355
  • How to fix CS9236? #78347
  • extension syntax bug #78346

Closed

  • IL baselines in the compiler should use metadata display #78240
  • API for generating the virtual project behind file-based programs #78159
    Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not offer use-expr-body for properties with initializers #78360
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #78358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delete copy of System.IO.Hashing sources #78357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix syntax tree creation when modifying source generated documents #78343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Make IDiagnosticAnalyzerService into an IWorkspaceService #78359
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add BuildHost APIs for loading an in-memory project #78303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add dump reporting for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/76225 #78354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow Razor logs to be directed to the right output window in VS Code #78334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unnecessary dependency in LSP handlers #78356
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify Impl interface tests #78351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Clean up ReferenceEqualityComparer polyfill #78350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not use nint / nuint in IL baselines #78246
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Cleanup IDE space around instance operators #78349
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reenable source indexing #78352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implement SeparatedSyntaxList.Count(Func<T, bool>) #78348
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow batch updating of ProjectUpdateState's RemovedMetadataReferences and AddedMetadataReferences members #78342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Refactor/cleanup usages of MakeCallWithNoExplicitArgument helper #78273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'UserDefinedCompoundAssignment' into 'extensions' #78302
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • For IsAtDotDotToken, ensure the current token is a DotToken before parsing the next token to see if it's also a DotToken. #78338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: honor OverloadResolutionPriority attribute #78219
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Insert missing space in XML documentation #78361
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move remaining legacy workspace event listeners over to new APIs. #78333
    VSCode
  • Extract base LanguageServerProjectLoader from LanguageServerProjectSystem #78329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • On-the-fly-docs -- Add better testing and provide more context for more cases #78148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use ActivationConstraint.FeatureFlag API to control when Semantic Search is enabled #77133
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cleanup the code we have to run copilot code in parallel #78324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Filter out CompilerFeatureRequired and Obsolete attribute from method symbols #78313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Required Members
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Edit & Continue support for field access in auto-properties #78289
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix async hoisted type substituted local #78231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Optimize work done in ProjectCodeModelFactory #78337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly load directory broken #115135
  • [API Proposal]: Sort() on OrderedDictionary #115127
  • Binding source generator emits bad code for tuples #115133
  • Polyfill IAsyncEnumerable from Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces does not work in net8.0 without reference to Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces #115124
  • Arm64: phiFound || ((ehDsc != nullptr) && !m_pCompiler->m_dfsTree->Contains(ehDsc->ebdTryBeg)) SSA: insert phis #115123
  • Arm64: !"Inconsistent profile data" Remove empty try-catch-fault 3 #115122
    10.0.0
  • Assert failure: CheckInstrBytePattern(base[offset] & 0xF8, 0x58, base[offset]) #115120
  • [WinHTTP] Validate header values for ASCII #115112
    10.0.0
  • Full GC notify not raised on Server GC #115110
  • JIT: Wrong result with do-while loops #115109
  • GC pause times grow exponentially when DOTNET_EnableEventLog=1 #115108
    10.0.0
  • [browser] remove rest of StartupMemoryCache #115107
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Accept HttpCompletionOptions to more places #115106

Closed

  • 在一个EXE应用程序中调用多个由.NET9 AOT发布的动态库so文件会引发异常 #114193
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-overflowing widening sum to Vector types #114832
  • Test failure: System.Globalization.Tests.IdnMappingIdnaConformanceTests.GetAscii_Success #115087
    10.0.0
  • [Proposal]: .NET DI council #35999
  • TryAddSingleton custom AuthorizationPolicyProvider #36014
  • Respect ServiceLifeTime during resolution #36050
  • DependencyInjection does not allow lazy/factory injection of an IDisposable which should not be disposed #36049
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new minmax instructions when possible. #109081
    10.0.0
  • We deserve a Substring() method that does not throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException #113383
  • Implement IRootFunctions for Complex #113569
  • [API Proposal]: Revisit Avx10v2.V512 decision #113757
    10.0.0
  • double.ToString(string) missing digit using scientific notation #113155
  • Custom Numeric Format String Rounds Erroneously #114104
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests failing on macOS x64 Debug #104172
    Future
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new saturating conversion instructions when possible. #109080
    10.0.0
  • HW Intrinsics: Add BSR, BSF, and BSWAP intrinsics #10741
    Future
  • BCL: Encountering System.NullReferenceException when 'enumerationOptions' parameter of Directory.EnumerateFiles method is null #114623
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Public API for the Runtime Async #114310
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 10/18/2024 8:32:15 PM - Churn from Block Layout Changes #109122
    10.0.0
  • `mcs.exe -dumpMap` failing to print all the methods #87086
    10.0.0
  • Failure in DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.TestRateLimitingSampler(maxOperationPerSecond) - Two events were recorded #114945
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 9/10/2024 6:39:57 AM #107925
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.Functional.Tests crash on assert #112700
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ability to have stable hash codes #88031
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide API for freeing Variant memory #79402
    Future
  • Support using function pointers with `PersistedAssemblyBuilder` #115015
  • Proposal: return random double within a specific range (inclusive) #37905
  • Standard FixedArray types in BCL? #102462
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in ImmutableArray.ToBuilder #115104
  • Test failure: System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientSendMailTest_SendMailAsync.MultipleRecipients_Failure_All #115103

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Alma Linux 8 -> 9 #115132
    needs-area-label
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow xcast #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove Raspbian 10 #115129
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update gcc leg from v14 to v15 #115128
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • JIT: use root compiler instance for sufficient PGO observation #115119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix missing coverage of F# resources in linker RemoveResourcesStep #115116
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115114
    area-codeflow
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via dotnet.boot.js #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use Span<T>-based methods in System.Net.Mail #115111
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • [mono][infra] Extend subscriber list for `area-Infrastructure-mono` #115118
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix the value of MethodImplOptions.Async in spec #115126
    area-Meta, community-contribution, runtime-async
  • win-x86: Replace "ret n" thunks with assembly code #115089
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement breakpoint disassembly support for Intel APX #114120
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, apx
  • Fix IDN Test on Linux #115121
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Add null check for EnumerationOptions #114672
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Implement `CEE_LOCALLOC` and frame data allocator for dynamic stack allocations #114860
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Fix method table slot lookup #115057
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add single-file host tests for native library load #115061
    area-Single-File, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Consider WasmSDK projects RID agnostic #114429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant 'freeList' field from HashLookup class #114914
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Simplify conditional operator #112074
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [NativeAOT] Add linux-arm64 pri1 runtime tests to outerloop run #114948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add PKCS#8, SPKI and PEM support for SLH-DSA #114943
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding additional 8 eGPR. #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix regex description emitted by generator for switched branches #115136
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Simplify 64-bit platform conditions #115083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: PKCS12/PFX Loading #115100
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: Fix-up ASN.1 reading and writing logic #115066
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2697699 #115007
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Refactor around impDevirtualizeCall for GVM devirt #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] try disabling dwarf symbols in the aot output #114805
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use bitwise operations to get the absolute values of integers #113679
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [infra][Apple] Fix Apple mobile runtime test reporting #114862
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet run file.cs` `#:` directive for project references #48746
  • dotnet build --help does not show Property option `--property` #48742

Closed

  • Test failure in BlazorWebAssembly StaticWebAssets_BuildMinimal_Works - Expected group '.gz' to have '424' endpoints but found '423' - `dotnet.js.gz` is missing. #48750
  • Create cgmanifest.json file #46725
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • Containers targets need to keep 'execution time' data ordering consistent for single-RID publishes #48579

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude tests from binskim scanning #48756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement auto-restarting on rude edit or no-effect change #48752
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • Use LangVersion=Preview #48747
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Re-add the tar no-sign patch #48758
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass through OfficialBuilder #48757
  • Use OfficialBuildId from SB release manifest #48720
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #48745
  • Downgrade implicit version to unblock workloads testing from main #48704
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [dotnet test for MTP]: Copy implementation for determining project/solution to build from MSBuild #48748
  • Add / in between skipped tests and retrie tests #48540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • ensure that single-rid container publishes populate all container information #48584
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25228.1 #48743
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48741
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove dead VMR files #48744
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • macOS Installer: Update relese notes link #48722
    Servicing-consider, Branch Lockdown
  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [10.0.1xx-preview4] Consolidate UB and SB pipelines #48703
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support build/restore of file-based programs #48662
    Area-run-file
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Don't add solution folders outside the scope of solution directory #48611
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI
